NewsArticle.Title: DA Patch 7.34
NewsArticle.Content: DA Version 7.34 On Tuesday, July 31st, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.34 Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7: Please "right-click" your Darkages.exe icon and choose "Run as administrator" Patch notes *Adding new item graphics *Updating/adding maps *Updating "Balanced Arena" for future use
